plot: Mary and Luke are sorting out their relationship issues in a Laundromat when a stranger shows up and wedges himself into Mary's life. His persistence and her curiosity lead to a conversation that she will never forget.
title: Dressing an Ape in Armani
plot_es: Mary and Luke are sorting out their relationship issues in a Laundromat when a stranger shows up and wedges himself into Mary's life. His persistence and her curiosity lead to a conversation that she will never forget.
plot_en: Mary and Luke are sorting out their relationship issues in a Laundromat when a stranger shows up and wedges himself into Mary's life. His persistence and her curiosity lead to a conversation that she will never forget.
